parameters.name: TemplateToUse
parameters.description: Type of template to use as defined in swDwgTemplates_e

parameters.name: TemplateName
parameters.description: Reserved for future use; use NULL

title: ISldWorks.PreSelectDwgTemplateSize
description: Establishes which template to use when creating a drawing.
signature:
void PreSelectDwgTemplateSize( 
   System.Int32
TemplateToUse
,
   System.String
TemplateName
)

parameters.name: TemplateToUse
parameters.description: Type of template to use as defined in swDwgTemplates_e

parameters.name: TemplateName
parameters.description: Reserved for future use; use NULL

remarks:
By calling this method and specifying a template size, no dialog appears when the end-user interactively selects
File, New, Drawing
.
